metadata.title: CVE-2019-16092 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Symonics libmysofa 0.7 has a NULL pointer dereference in getHrtf inhrtf/reader.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16092` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1build1
libmysofa0 - 0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6~dfsg0-3+deb10u1build1').
